src:
7 Cara membuat manisan mangga enak, mudah, dan sederhana
Nggak cuma enak, mangga punya banyak vitamin yang baik bagi tubuh.
05 Nov 2019, 17:03 by Nur Luthfiana Hardian
Brilio.net - Hidup sehat bisa didapatkan dari beragam cara. Makan makanan yang bergizi seperti buah-buahan. Ada banyak buah yang bisa menunjang kesehatan tubuh, salah satu buah yang jadi favorit adalah mangga. Buah mangga dikenal punya gizi cukup tinggi, seperti vitamin A, B, C, E, dan K. Buah mangga adalah jenis buah tropis dan hanya bisa tumbuh di iklim hangat. Buah ini berasal dari India, namun kini sudah menyebar luas hingga Indonesia.Mangga ini paling enak dikonsumsi langsung, disajikan dengan es, dan bisa juga diolah jadi menu makanan lezat lainnya. Nah, saat siang hari yang begitu panas, makanan olahan mangga jadi paling diburu. Apalagi kalau bukan manisan mangga. Makanan yang satu punya tekstur kenyal, rasanya asam kecut campur manis, menambah cita rasa uniknya. Tak ayal membuat manisan mangga jadi menu olahan yang sangat menggoda selera.Biasanya mangga yang dijadikan manisan itu masih tergolong muda, supaya cita rasa asam lebih melekat. Jika kamu punya buah mangga mentah atau setengah matang dan sudah ingin segera menikmatinya, buat saja jadi manisan mangga yang menggugah selera. Olah manisan mangga sesuai selera sendiri atau keluarga. Caranya mudah dan nggak ribet deh. Sehat dapat, lezat pun diraih.Perpaduan rasa manis dan asam membuat mangga jadi favorit banyak orang. Lantas bagaimana resep manisan mangga ini? Berikut cara praktis membuat manisan mangga yang brilio.net rangkum dari berbagai sumber pada Selasa (5/11).1. Manisan mangga kering.


foto: Instagram/@angelina_deeandra

Bahan:- 9 buah mangga muda- 8 sdm gula- 2 sdm garamCara membuat:a. Kupas mangga, potong memanjang.b. Taburi garam sambil diremas-remas sampai layu dan keluar airnya. Cuci bersih, peras agar garam dan air hilang. Beri gula, aduk rata.c. Masukkan ke lemari es.d. Jemur di terik mata hari selama 1 hari atau sampai kering. Setelah itu taburi gula.2. Manisan mangga muda sambal terasi.


foto: Instagram/@simonmitra73

Bahan:- 1 buah mangga muda- 1/2 terasi udang (optional)- 1 sdt gula- 10 siung bawang merah- 3 siung bawang putih- 1/2 sdt penyedap- 10-15 buah cabai rawit (optional)- 2 sdt garamCara membuat:a. Cuci bersih mangga muda, bawang, dan cabai.b. Goreng bawang merah dan bawang putih sampai layu, tambahkan irisan mangga muda, cabai, garam, gula, terasi, dan penyedap rasa.c. Ulek hingga tercampur rata.3. Manisan pedas buah mangga apel.


foto: Instagram/@swancute13_

Bahan:- Cabai rawit merah secukupnya- 5 buah mangga apel di kupas iris tipis- 4 sdm gula pasir- 1 1/2 gelas air es- 1 sdt garam- 1/2 gelas air panasCara membuat:a. Ulek cabai bersama garam sampai halus. Tuang air panas, masukkan ke wadah yang sudah diisi irisan buah mangga apel.b. Beri gula pasir, aduk rata. Tunggu sampai gula larut.c. Tuang air es.4. Manisan mangga pedas serut.


foto: Instagram/@novihairina

Bahan:- 5 buah mangga serut- 150 ml air- Garam dengan takaran seujung sendok teh- 5 sdm gula pasir- 5 buah cabai rawit potong-potong- 5 buah jeruk kasturiCara membuat:a. Serut buah mangga, masukkan ke wadah.b. Beri garam dan perasan jeruk kasturi.c. Rebus air bersama cabai dan gula, tunggu hingga mendidih. Matikan kompor dan biarkan uap panasnya hilang.c. Tuang rebusan air cabai ke wadah berisi serutan mangga tadi, sambil disaring agar biji cabai tidak ikut.d. Aduk rata, lalu bisa disantap langsung atau dimasukkan ke lemari es terlebih dulu.5. Manisan mangga kuah jeruk.


foto: cookpad.com

Bahan:- 3 buah mangga muda- 5 sdm gula pasir- 5 buah cabe rawit- 1 sdm garam- 6 buah jeruk manisCara membuat:a. Kupas mangga muda, iris tipis-tipis. Beri 1 sdm garam sembari diremas hingga layu. Diamkan selama 3 menit.b. Cuci irisan mangga muda dengan air bersih 3 kali.c. Rebus 5 buah cabai dengan air sampai mendidih, haluskan.d. Peras jeruk manis, ambil airnya.e. Campurkan semua bahan jadi satu.6. Manisan mangga bengkoang.


foto: cookpad.com

Bahan:- 1 kg mangga muda- 100 gram gula merah- Air asam jawa secukupnya- 1/2 kg bengkoang- 1 sdt garam- 200 gram gula pasirBumbu halus:- 2 buah cabai merah- 3 buah cabai keritingCara membuat:a. Kupas mangga dan bengkoang, iris tipis. Lumuri mangga dengan garam, diamkan selama 15 menit.b. Buang biji cabai kemudian haluskan.c. Rebus air dengan gula pasir, gula merah, air asam jawa dan cabai halus sampai mendidih.d. Tuang air rebusan ke mangga muda dan bengkoang. Diamkan sampai dingin.e. Masukkan ke lemari es semalam sampai bumbu meresap.7. Manisan mangga tanpa gula pasir.


foto: Instagram/@eattemptationsby

Bahan:- 1000 gram mangga- 100 gram organic coconut sugar light- 250 ml air matang- 7 sachet gula stevia- 1 sdm seasalt (garam laut)- 5 buah cabai rawit merah, irisCara membuat:a. Kupas mangga, potong tipis. Taburi seasalt sambil diremas hingga layu. Diamkan selama 30 menit, cuci bersih mangga.b. Rebus air, organic coconut sugar, cabai rawit, dan gula stevia. Tunggu sampai gula larut. Matikan api diamkan hingga dingin.c. Tata mangga ke wadah. Tuang larutan gula. Diamkan sehari, esoknya simpan ke lemari es.

RECOMMENDED

text:
7 Ways to make Mango Candied are tasty, easy, and simple
Not just delicious, mangoes have a lot of vitamins that are good for the body.
05 Nov 2019, 17:03 by Nur Luthfiana Hardian
Brilio.net - Healthy living can be obtained in various ways. Eat nutritious foods like fruits. There are many fruits that can support the health of the body, one of the favorite fruits is mango. Mangoes are known to have quite high nutrition, such as vitamins A, B, C, E, and K. Mangoes are a type of tropical fruit and can only grow in warm climates. This fruit originates from India, but has now spread widely to Indonesia. This mango is most delicious to be consumed directly, served with ice, and can also be processed into a menu of other delicious foods. Well, when the day is so hot, processed mango food is the most hunted. Especially if it's not candied mango. One food has a chewy texture, sweet and sour mixed sweet sour taste, adding to its unique taste. No doubt making candied mango processed menu is very tempting. Usually mango which is used as preserved is still relatively young, so that the sour taste is more attached. If you have raw or undercooked mangoes and want to enjoy them immediately, just make them a tempting mango sweetmeat. Candied mango according to taste alone or family. It's easy and not complicated. You can get healthy, delicious too. The combination of sweet and sour taste makes mango a favorite of many people. Then how about this mango candied recipe? Here's a practical way to make brilio.net candied mango, which is summarized from various sources on Tuesday (11/5). Candied dried mangoes.


photo: Instagram / @ angelina_deeandra

Ingredients: - 9 young mangoes - 8 tablespoons of sugar - 2 tablespoons of salt How to make: a. Peel the mango, cut it lengthwise. B. Sprinkle salt while squeezing until wilted and the water comes out. Wash thoroughly, squeeze out so that the salt and water disappear. Give sugar, stir well.c. Put it in the fridge.d. Dry in the sun for 1 day or until dry. After that sprinkle sugar.2. Candied young mango chili paste.


photo: Instagram / @ simonmitra73

Ingredients: - 1 young mango - 1/2 shrimp paste (optional) - 1 teaspoon sugar - 10 cloves of onion - 3 cloves of garlic - 1/2 teaspoon flavoring - 10-15 pieces of cayenne pepper (optional) - 2 teaspoons salt make: a. Wash young mangoes, onions, and chili. B. Fry onion and garlic until wilted, add young mango slices, chili, salt, sugar, shrimp paste, and flavoring.c. Repeat until evenly mixed. Spicy candied mango apple.


photo: Instagram / @ swancute13_

Ingredients: - Red cayenne pepper to taste- 5 pieces of apple mango peeled into thin slices- 4 tablespoons granulated sugar- 1 1/2 cups ice water- 1 teaspoon salt- 1/2 cup hot water How to make: a. Rub chilies with salt until smooth. Pour in hot water, put it in a container that has been filled with apple slices. B. Give sugar, stir well. Wait until the sugar has dissolved. C. Pour ice water. Candied spicy mango shaved.


photo: Instagram / @ novihairina

Ingredients: - 5 pieces of shaved mangoes - 150 ml of water - Salt with a tip of a teaspoonful - 5 tablespoons of sugar - 5 pieces of chopped cayenne pepper - 5 pieces of citrus orange How to make: a. Drawstring mangoes, put them in a container. B. Give salt and kasturi orange juice. C. Boil water with chili and sugar, wait until it boils. Turn off the stove and let the hot steam disappear.c. Pour the chili water into a container containing the mango shavings, while filtering so that the chili seeds do not participate. Mix well, then can be eaten directly or put in the refrigerator first. Candied mango orange sauce.


photo: cookpad.com

Ingredients: - 3 young mangoes - 5 tablespoons granulated sugar - 5 cayenne peppers - 1 tablespoon salt - 6 sweet oranges How to make: a. Peel the young mango, thinly sliced. Give 1 tablespoon of salt while squeezing until wilted. Let stand for 3 minutes.b. Wash young mango slices with clean water 3 times.c. Boil 5 chilies with water until boiling, puree.d. Squeeze sweet orange, take the water. Mix all ingredients together. Mango candied yam.


photo: cookpad.com

Ingredients: - 1 kg of young mango - 100 grams of brown sugar - Tough tamarind water - 1/2 kg bengkoang - 1 teaspoon salt - 200 grams of granulated sugar Refined spices: - 2 pieces of red chili - 3 pieces of curly chili How to make: a. Peel the mango and yam, thinly sliced. Coat the mango with salt, let it sit for 15 minutes. B. Remove the chili seeds and puree.c. Boil water with white sugar, brown sugar, tamarind water and chilli until boiling. Pour the cooking water into young mangoes and yam. Leave it to cool. Put it in the refrigerator overnight until the seasoning permeated. Candied mangoes without sugar.


photo: Instagram / @ eattemptationsby

Ingredients: - 1000 grams of mango - 100 grams of organic coconut sugar light - 250 ml of boiled water - 7 sachets of stevia sugar - 1 tablespoon seasalt (sea salt) - 5 pieces of red cayenne pepper, iris How to make: a. Peel the mango, cut it thinly. Sprinkle seasalt while squeezing until withered. Let stand for 30 minutes, wash mango. B. Boil water, organic coconut sugar, cayenne pepper, and stevia sugar. Wait until the sugar has dissolved. Turn off the heat, let it cool. C. Arrange the mango into a container. Pour the sugar solution. Let stand a day, tomorrow store it in the fridge.

RECOMMENDED
